alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 3:23AM MST until December 31 at 5:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 5000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches above 6500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Plateau. In Nevada, Lincoln County, Sheep Range and Spring Mountains. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on winter road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mountain roads in Lincoln and northern Mohave county will also be impacted. Highway 389 between Colorado City and Fredonia may also become icy or snow-packed.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
